name: soundproofing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
special material put in a room or building in order to prevent sound from passing out of or into it, or the act of putting in this material: He added soundproofing in response to neighbours' complaints about noise. See
soundproof
More examplesFewer examplesThe agreement also proposes a western-access road into O'Hare and provides $450 million in additional soundproofing for nearby homes and schools.He has tried to persuade city officials to include his duplex in a soundproofing program that insulates single-family homes from airport noise. Good soundproofing made for peaceful sleeping.American Foam sold the foam to the nightclub, where it was used as soundproofing.
